body.name: Redragon Wireless Gaming Mouse, Tri-Mode 2.4G/USB-C/Bluetooth Mouse Gaming, 10000 DPI, RGB Backlit, Fully Programmable, Rechargeable Wireless Computer Mouse for Laptop PC Mac, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 25 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 【3 Modes Connectivity, Connect Without Limits】Our M914 wireless gaming mouse adopts BT/2.4G/Wired connectivity, make it easy to switch between different devices, such as laptop, PC, IPad, or different systems. Meeting different user needs for gaming or working.

【9 Programmable Buttons】M914 gaming mouse allows for button remapping , assignment of complex macro functions, customize lighting from nearly 16.8 million colors through redragon driver. Note: The driver only supports 2.4G wireless and wired mode, Windows systems.

【Cool RGB Illumination】With 6 preset RGB backlight effects, it is possible for you to personalize your bluetooth gaming mouse from a spectrum of over 16. 8 million colors to match your setup, specific games, or to showcase your favorite colors.

【E-Sports Sensor】Incredibly precise, fast and consistent control with PAW3395 Sensor, this gaming mouse features with high precision sensor up to 10000 DPI, offers on-the-fly sensitivity adjustment through dedicated DPI buttons (reprogrammable) for gaming and creative work
【Secret Weapon For Your Game】Never miss a gaming mouse that adopts Rapid Fire button ((1 Click=Triple Clicks) while you are gaming, it helps you beat your opponents quickly with just one click.

【Built To Last】The rechargeable wireless mouse has a battery life up to 70 hours (RGB off, 2.4G mode) on a single charge, providing you with non stopping using. It will auto sleep after 8 minutes of inactively for power saving.This mouse can be used as a wired gaming mouse while charging.

【Professional After Sales Service】We provide every Redragon customer with 36-Month Warranty , Please feel free to contact us when you meet any problem. We will spare no effort to provide the best service to every customer within 24 hours to help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Really solid mouse so far. Good battery life, and they nice thing is it easily toggles between 2.4 and BT so I can set my work laptop to BT and my gaming desktop to the dongle and just need to flip a switch. We’ll see how long this mouse lives!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had it for two months. No issues so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's hard to find Bluetooth gaming mice at a price like this. I also like the fact that it gives you the option to use it with a wireless receiver or plugged in. I'm curious how long the internal rechargeable battery will last before it goes dead, but I'm guessing that can be replaced. It looks good and feels great in the hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mouse with some drawbacks
reviews.reviewText: The Redragon gaming mouse is a budget-friendly gaming mouse that offers a lot of value for the price. It has a comfortable design, a responsive sensor, and a variety of customizable features. However, there are a few drawbacks that prevent it from being a perfect mouse.One of the biggest drawbacks of the Redragon gaming mouse is its battery life. The mouse uses a rechargeable battery, but it only lasts for about 20 hours on a single charge. pretty much have to leave it charging every night.Another drawback of the Redragon gaming mouse is its RGB lighting. The RGB lighting is bright and colorful but the RGB lighting is not synced with other Redragon devices, such as the Redragon gaming keyboard.Despite these drawbacks, the Redragon gaming mouse is still a good choice for gamers on a budget. It has a comfortable design, a responsive sensor, and a variety of customizable features. If you are looking for a budget-friendly gaming mouse, the Redragon gaming mouse is a good option to consider.Here is a more detailed breakdown of the pros and cons of the Redragon gaming mouse:Pros:Comfortable designResponsive sensorCustomizable featuresAffordableCons:Short battery lifeNot very customizable RGB lightingRGB lighting is not synced with other Redragon devicesOverall, I would rate the Redragon gaming mouse just under 4 stars. It is a good choice for gamers on a budget, but it does have some drawbacks, such as the battery life and RGB lighting.Here are some additional thoughts on the Redragon gaming mouse:I think the Redragon gaming mouse is a good choice for gamers who are new to gaming or who are on a tight budget. It is a well-built mouse with a comfortable design and a responsive sensor.However, if you are looking for a more customizable mouse or a mouse with better battery life, you may want to consider other options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excelente, me gusta mucho, la bateria le dura poco mas de dos días, lo uso todos los dias, mas de 12 horas diarias con el RGB activo, es de buen tamaño y peso, y el material es rigido.Dato curioso: Lo puedes conectar a tu teléfono por bluetooth.Unica recomendación:- Para el vendedor : Deben especificar qué modelos usan software compatible con Mac y con Windows en la descripción del producto. Lo compré para usarlo en mi Mac y no puedo controlar el RGB desde ella, pero desde la Windows si.- Para el consumidor : Revisar en la pagina si el software del mouse funciona con tu sistema operativo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this mouse because I was looking at Redragon products after purchasing their keyboard k652 and loving the quality and features, just like the keyboard the mouse is full of things you did not know you needed. like connectivity = 3 BT devices, 2.4Ghz dongle that hides under the mouse and wired USB-C (by the way brings his own USB-C cable) I was skeptical as other Redragon products look more over the top gaming childish style but this mouse altho it does have its gaming looks, is more functional than gimmicky and the RBG is nice and can be changed via a button right by the DPI selector . I got for productivity more than gaming and is awesome as you can remap key and like me that use tons of copy/paste the rapid fire button is mapped to "Select" by default, making it easier to work also the weight and feel is great and the combo of materials smooth on top and grippy on the sides it makes up for a good experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best mouse that I ever had

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great looking mouse works fine, but might as well be wired with the amount of time you'll spend charging this thing.The worst battery life I've ever seen on a wireless mouse. Full charge doesn't even last a day.

This is my second Redragon M601. The first one is still going strong 3 years later. I needed another for my Gaming rig. I now have the Redragon Mouse pad, Redragon Keyboard and 2 Redragon M601's. I'm a fan.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cumplio con mis expectativas y es demasiado bueno Calidad-Precio
reviews.reviewText: Cumplio con mis expectativas por el precio, ademas de cambiar el peso del mouse, hace un buen drag click pero por su precio esta excelente, el software es demasiado bueno, tuve complicaciones con el ya que se despregramaba (Tenia windows 10) pero desde que me cambie de sistema operativo (me cambie a Mini Os) ya no se me ha desprogramado el mouse, solo cuando lo desconecto del computador, pero aparte de todo eso esta excelente para el gaming y te lo recomiendo mucho si apenas estas empezando en esto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice, robust and great response time.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been really enjoying using this computer mouse, in both the wireless and wired modes.I do have to admit I use it in the wired mode much more than in wireless just because I find it to be more responsive to my movements while gaming rather than with the receiver plugged in.It’s a great idea to have the receiver in the base of the mouse, I definitely would’ve lost it by now if it wasn’t attached to it. Such a good idea.It comes with a cool little sticker sheet which I thought was a nice addition, I’ve modified a few of my stands now with them and they all match nicely.All led lights in the mouse are low power so I haven’t experienced them getting hot or effecting the use of the mouse. All instructions are clear and have helped me understand the different ways I can have the lights flowing and what each different button does on the mouse too.
Quite smooth to use and easy to set up..3 connection modes (USB, BT and 2.4G) is very useful.. battery life can be further improved though..

Although it wasn’t the mouse I purchased and it was the rgb one, it still looks incredible and feels very hight quality. But the right click sometimes gets jammed, I’ve seen complaints here also talking about it. I don’t if it was shipping but I still really like it even though it is very annoying. Especially when you’re playing fps games.
